mainEntity.name: What role does blockchain play in the pharmaceutical supply chain?

acceptedAnswer.text: Blockchain technology enhances transparency and traceability in the pharmaceutical supply chain, ensuring drug authenticity and improving patient safety.

mainEntity.name: How does blockchain help combat counterfeit drugs?

acceptedAnswer.text: Blockchain provides a secure and immutable ledger that tracks drugs from production to distribution, making it difficult for counterfeit drugs to enter the supply chain.

mainEntity.name: What are smart contracts, and how do they impact the pharmaceutical industry?

acceptedAnswer.text: Smart contracts are self-executing contracts with the terms of the agreement directly written into code. In the pharmaceutical industry, they automate processes in the supply chain, reducing errors and enhancing efficiency.

mainEntity.name: How does blockchain technology ensure data security in healthcare?

acceptedAnswer.text: Blockchain secures healthcare data by encrypting it and storing it across a decentralized network, preventing unauthorized access and ensuring data integrity and confidentiality.

mainEntity.name: What is the future of blockchain technology in personalized medicine?

acceptedAnswer.text: The integration of blockchain in personalized medicine can potentially improve data sharing, patient privacy, and treatment customization by creating a secure platform for managing individualized healthcare data.
